message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today at a premium price of $18,000. I know this is a unique item, and I believe it will be a valuable asset for you. What do you think?
Alice, your initial offer is way too high for me.  I'm really interested in this product, but I can't justify paying more than $10,000.  This is my best and final offer.

Bob, I understand your position, but $18,000 is my opening offer, and it reflects the true value of this product.  I'm willing to come down to $15,000, but that's as low as I can go.  It's a steal at this price.
Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $15,000 is still too much for me. I'm firm on my offer of $10,000.  It's a fair price for both of us, and I'm ready to close the deal now.
